title: Lynda - Moodle 3.0 Essential Training
description:
Lynda - Moodle 3.0 Essential Training

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 56m Beginner Jan 06, 2016   | Uploaded in Jan 12, 2016 by 2boweb

Subject:  Education + Elearning 
Software:  Moodle 
Author:  Oliver Schinkten 

Your Moodle training starts here. Learn how to create engaging online classes for all levels of learners with Moodle 3.0. Oliver Schinkten is an expert in learning and teaching, and he's passionate about learning management systems like Moodle. In this course, he gets you up to speed with the Moodle 3.0 interface and then builds a digital classroom from the ground up with Moodle's content blocks and activities. Oliver shows how to organize a course, customize the look and layout, add resources and activities, set up your gradebook, and more. Plus, learn how to make your courses more engaging and interactive with quizzes, links, forums, and surveys, and communicate with students online via messages and progress reports.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Navigating a Moodle course
	â€¢	Starting with a blank course shell
	â€¢	Using Moodle blocks to add different features and functionality
	â€¢	Creating course sections
	â€¢	Adding resources as file downloads and links
	â€¢	Incorporating assignments, quizzes, and forums
	â€¢	Enrolling students
	â€¢	Creating groups
	â€¢	Setting up the gradebook
